channel.title: Starter
channel.description: How do you make it so a starter command can only be used once by the person so you type ::starter get the 250 mill and you type it agian and it doesnt allow you to get it agian adn sends a message to everyone saying +playername is trying to get starter agian!

item.title: Starter
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

I’ll write my own:

if(command.startsWith("starter")) { if(starter == 0) { addItem(995, 250000000); } else if(starter >= 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" is trying to get a second starter kit!"; }

Something close to that. Havn’t looked at a client.java in ages.

Read full topic

item.title: Starter
item.dc:creator: @mcnuget5 mcnuget5
item.description:
@mcnuget5 wrote:

dude hat rickscape v5 starter kit

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 15000000); addItem(4151, 1); sendMessage("the rickscape v5 starter kit"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack !"); } }

lol yhat the same as rickscape v5

smiley

item.title: Starter
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Make it write starter to their moreinfo file when it saves and have it load it when they log in, too.

Read full topic

item.title: Starter
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

and that command,allows you to use the command as many times as needed.

try this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 15000000); addItem(4151, 1); sendMessage("The Pk War Isle X World 2 starter pack!!"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack !"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Starter
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[quote=“im hard, post:2, topic:165015”]Go to client.java and type this.

if (command.startsWith(“yourcommand”))
{
addItem(itemid, amount)
[/quote]You have no ending bracket?

Read full topic

item.title: Starter
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

Go to client.java and type this.

if (command.startsWith(“yourcommand”))
{
addItem(itemid, amount)
}

If you want to make more then one then type:

if (command.startsWith(“yourcommand”))
{
addItem(itemid, amount)
addItem(itemid, amount)
}

And keep typing more of the addItem(itemid, amount) if you want more items.

Read full topic
